name: Luis Subias
text: Came in to patch up a flat tire with a nail. They took me in as a walk in and fixed it super fast. Exceptional customer service, they took care of everything from fixing it to putting it back on the car.

name: Sendy Ruiz
text: Great prices and great ppl. Needed 4 tires. Went in was done in less than hr!

name: Daniel Schmidt
text: Fast friendly help when I needed it really bad, pulled in with a totally ruined tire, they put a new one on in just a few minutes

name: Mike Abene III
text: Brought my 30ft RV to have 6 tires mounted... Great hospitable group of people working there from top to bottom.

name: Lynette Flores
text: Best place for new and used tires. Honest, fast and good priced.

name: Syed Ahmed
text: Quick service, got 2 used tires for my 2002 Honda accord.
